document.full_text: holding internet platforms liable for third-party content would lead to self-censorship and reduce the free flow of information, google inc said on wednesday in reaction to india's new rules.
document.title: indian web rules risk curbing info flow: google
lines_and_colors: holding internet platforms liable for third-party content would lead to self-censorship and reduce the free flow of information, google inc said on wednesday in reaction to india's new rules.
